page.title: 08ROYAL ANCHOR
page.content: The Royal Anchor is very famous because Nelson who is Lord Nelson had his last breakfast there before he set off for victory down at Portsmouth. Also in the Royal Anchor ther are some bones up one of the chimneys because one of the criminals climbed up there but the guards shot him but he never came down until a few years ago when he fell down into the fire. In one of the rooms there is wupposed to be a ghost because the owners were sleeping and the son was talking to this ghost but when they heard their speaking they looked up but they did not see anything there. Now the Royal Anchor is a pub and restaurant and that is it. It is no longer a hotel for people to stay; but a Berni Inn, one of a large chain of steak houses.
